# Ministry of Industry and Trade (Czech Republic)

|employees       =
|budget          =
|chief1_name     = Lukáš Vlček
|chief1_position = Minister of Industry and Trade
|website         = [http://www.mpo.cz/ www.mpo.cz]
|footnotes       =
}}
The Ministry of Industry and Trade of the Czech Republic () is a government ministry, which was established in 1992.
